title: Deterministic Random Bit Generators Based on Ascon for Embedded Systems
summary: As the Deterministic Random Bit Generator (DRBG) serves as a fundamental component in random number generation and cryptographic applications, its performance and security are particularly critical in resource-constrained embedded systems, where memory capacity and computational efficiency are limited.
